91 
92  ARMAView(unsigned int maxP, unsigned int maxQ, int channels = 1)
93  :
94  mAR(maxP + 1),
95  mMA(maxQ + 1),
96  mChannels(channels) {
97  ResizeAR(maxP + 1);
98  ResizeMA(maxQ + 1);
99  };

107  :

122  void Load(const char *filename, const char *fmt = "txt") {
123  eternity::xml_archive fa;
124  fa.open(filename, eternity::archive::load);
125  xml_serialize(fa, "");
126  fa.close();
127  }
128 
129  void Save(const char *filename, const char *fmt = "txt") {
130  eternity::xml_archive fa;
131  fa.open(filename, eternity::archive::store);
132  xml_serialize(fa, "");
133  fa.close();
134  }
135 
136  void xml_serialize(eternity::xml_archive& xml, const char* prefix) {
137  char buffer[1024];
138 
139  if (xml.is_loading()) {
140 
141  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mChannels", prefix);
142  xml.read(buffer, mChannels, 0);
143  unsigned int sz;
144 
145  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mARsize", prefix);
146  xml.read(buffer, sz, 0);
147  mAR.resize(sz);
148  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sz; i++) {
149  unsigned int sz1, sz2;
150 
151  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mAR.%d.sz1", prefix, i);
152  xml.read(buffer, sz1, 0);
153  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mAR.%d.sz2", prefix, i);
154  xml.read(buffer, sz2, 0);
155  mAR[i].resize(sz1, sz2);
156  for (unsigned j = 0; j < sz1; j++) {
157  for (unsigned k = 0; k < sz2; k++) {
158  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mAR.%d.%d.%d", prefix, i, j, k);
159  xml.read(buffer, mAR[i](j, k), 0);
160  }
161  }
162  }
163 
164  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mMAsize", prefix);
165  xml.read(buffer, sz, 0);
166  mMA.resize(sz);
167  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sz; i++) {
168  unsigned int sz1, sz2;
169  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mMA.%d.sz1", prefix, i);
170  xml.read(buffer, sz1, 0);
171  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mMA.%d.sz2", prefix, i);
172  xml.read(buffer, sz2, 0);
173  mMA[i].resize(sz1, sz2);
174  for (unsigned j = 0; j < sz1; j++) {
175  for (unsigned k = 0; k < sz2; k++) {
176  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mMA.%d.%d.%d", prefix, i, j, k);
177  xml.read(buffer, mMA[i](j, k), 0);
178  }
179  }
180  }
181 
182 
183  } else {
184 
185  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mChannels", prefix);
186  xml.write(buffer, mChannels);
187  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mARsize", prefix);
188  xml.write(buffer, mAR.size());
189 
190  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mAR.size(); i++) {
191 
192  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mAR.%d.sz1", prefix, i);
193  xml.write(buffer, mAR[i].size1());
194  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mAR.%d.sz2", prefix, i);
195  xml.write(buffer, mAR[i].size2());
196 
197  for (unsigned j = 0; j < mAR[i].size1(); j++) {
198  for (unsigned k = 0; k < mAR[i].size2(); k++) {
199  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mAR.%d.%d.%d", prefix, i, j, k);
200  xml.write(buffer, mAR[i](j, k));
201  }
202  }
203  }
204 
205  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mMAsize", prefix);
206  xml.write(buffer, mMA.size());
207 
208  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mMA.size(); i++) {
209 
210  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mMA.%d.sz1", prefix, i);
211  xml.write(buffer, mMA[i].size1());
212  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mMA.%d.sz2", prefix, i);
213  xml.write(buffer, mMA[i].size2());
214 
215  for (unsigned j = 0; j < mMA[i].size1(); j++) {
216  for (unsigned k = 0; k < mMA[i].size2(); k++) {
217  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mMA.%d.%d.%d", prefix, i, j, k);
218  xml.write(buffer, mMA[i](j, k));
219  }
220  }
221  }
222  }
223  }

385 
386  void SetOrder(unsigned int maxP, unsigned int maxQ) {
387  if (maxP + 1 != mAR.size())
388  ResizeAR(maxP + 1);
389  if (maxQ + 1 != mMA.size())
390  ResizeMA(maxQ + 1);
391  };
392 
393 
398 
399  void SetChannels(unsigned int channels) {
400  if (channels != mChannels) {
401  mChannels = channels;
402  ResizeAR(mAR.size());
403  ResizeMA(mMA.size());
404  }
405  };
406 
408 
409 
410  protected:
411 
412  private:
413 
414 
419 
420  void ResizeAR(unsigned int order) {
421  if (order != mAR.size()) {
422  mAR.resize(order);
423  mAR.clear();
424  }
425 
426  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mAR.size(); i++) {
427  mAR[i].resize(mChannels, mChannels);
428  mAR[i].clear();
429  }
430  };
431 
436 
437  void ResizeMA(unsigned int order) {
438  if (order != mMA.size()) {
439  mMA.resize(order);
440  mMA.clear();
441  }
442  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mMA.size(); i++) {
443  mMA[i].resize(mChannels, mChannels);
444  mMA[i].clear();
445  }
446  };
447 
448  VDmatrix mAR;
449  VDmatrix mMA;
450  unsigned int mChannels;
451 
452  };
